description: Enterprise techniques used by RawDisk, ATT&CK software S0364 v1.0
name: RawDisk (S0364)

techniques.comment: RawDisk was used in Shamoon to write to protected system locations such as the MBR and disk partitions in an effort to destroy data.[3][4]
RawDisk has been used to directly access the hard disk to help overwrite arbitrarily sized portions of disk content.[2]
RawDisk was used in Shamoon to help overwrite components of disk structure like the MBR and disk partitions.[3][4]
